00014 struct NPC
00015 {
00016   // Services
00017   enum Services
00018     {
00019       // This merchant buys:
00020       Weapon        = 0x00001,
00021       Armor     = 0x00002,
00022       Clothing      = 0x00004,
00023       Books     = 0x00008,
00024       Ingredients   = 0x00010,
00025       Picks     = 0x00020,
00026       Probes        = 0x00040,
00027       Lights        = 0x00080,
00028       Apparatus     = 0x00100,
00029       RepairItem    = 0x00200,
00030       Misc      = 0x00400,
00031 
00032       // Other services
00033       Spells        = 0x00800,
00034       MagicItems    = 0x01000,
00035       Potions       = 0x02000,
00036       Training      = 0x04000, // What skills?
00037       Spellmaking   = 0x08000,
00038       Enchanting    = 0x10000,
00039       Repair        = 0x20000
00040     };
00041 
00042   enum Flags
00043     {
00044       Female    = 0x0001,
00045       Essential = 0x0002,
00046       Respawn   = 0x0004,
00047       Autocalc  = 0x0008,
00048       Skeleton  = 0x0400, // Skeleton blood effect (white)
00049       Metal = 0x0800  // Metal blood effect (golden?)
00050     };
00051 
00052 #pragma pack(push)
00053 #pragma pack(1)
00054   struct NPDTstruct52
00055   {
00056     short level;
00057     char strength, intelligence, willpower, agility,
00058       speed, endurance, personality, luck;
00059     char skills[27];
00060     char reputation;
00061     short health, mana, fatigue;
00062     char disposition, factionID, rank;
00063     char unknown;
00064     int gold;
00065   }; // 52 bytes

00071       unknown1, unknown2, unknown3;

00073   }; // 12 bytes

00079     // The last u's might be the skills that this NPC can train you
00080     // in?
00081     int services; // See the Services enum
00082   }; // 12 bytes
00083
